explanation: The task was to stack the cubes on pad three in a specific order. First, the blue cube was moved from its initial position on top of the green cube to pad three. Next, the green cube was placed on top of the blue cube. Then, the yellow cube was moved from its initial position on pad one to the top of the green cube. Finally, the red cube was moved from pad two to the top of the blue cube, completing the stack in the specified order. Each grasp and place action was followed by a return to the home position to ensure the arm was correctly positioned for the next move.
prompt: Stack the cubes on pad three with the following order, blue cube on pad, red cube above blue, green cube above blue and yellow cube above green
